alert.note: Alert for Barrow; Gwinnett (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Barrow and northeastern Gwinnett Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 830 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Hog Mountain, or near Lawrenceville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Lawrenceville, Sugar Hill, Suwanee, Buford, Auburn, Dacula, and Hog Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
